arStrings.szText: {c_important}Fireball's{/c} radius is increased based on distance traveled, up to {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|%|]{/c}.
{c_important}Fireball's{/c} Critical Strike Damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_19} * 100|%+|]{/c}, increased to {c_number}[{SF_21} * 100|%+|]{/c} when hitting at least {c_number}3{/c} enemies.
{c_important}Fireball{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%|]{/c} of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.
